name: fix
description: Fix workflow: convert actionable PR review comments into a GitHub issue
description_long: PR-triggered workflow that fetches actionable review comments from a PR, groups them by file/line with reviewer attribution, and creates a GitHub issue prefixed with [Fixes PR #N] for the fix workflow to address. Triggered by the request:fix label on PRs.

steps.name: Generate Fix Issue
steps.description: Convert actionable PR review comments into a structured GitHub issue
steps.prompt:
Process PR review comments and generate fix issue.

pr_number=$ARGUMENTS
adw_id=${adw_id}

Steps:
1. Fetch actionable review comments for the PR
2. Group findings by file/line with reviewer attribution
3. Create GitHub issue with [Fixes PR #N] prefix and agent label
4. Report success or failure
